overview: Scaredy Squirrel never leaves his nut treeâ€¦until one day, his worst nightmares come true! Scaredy Squirrel suddenly finds himself out of his tree. As he leaps into the unknown, he discovers something really uplifting and surprising about himself. The Scaredy Squirrel Trilogy features the original classic story plus the sequels, Scaredy Squirrel at Night and Scaredy Squirrel Makes a Friend.
tagline: ...Featuring Scaredy Squirrel, Scaredy Squirrel Makes A Friend & Scaredy Squirrel At Night
title: Scaredy Squirrel Trilogy
